org.corfudb.sharedlog

Interface ClientAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientLib

    public interface ClientAPI
    Author:
    dalia

    • Method Detail

      • grainsize

        int grainsize()
       throws CorfuException
        Returns:
        a "grain" size, the equivalent of an individual Corfu log-page
        Throws:
        CorfuException

      • readExtnt

        ExtntWrap readExtnt()
             throws CorfuException
        Reads the next extent; it remembers the last read extent (starting with zero).
        Returns:
        an extent wrapper, containing ExtntInfo and a list of ByteBuffers, one for each individual log-entry page
        Throws:
        CorfuException

      • readExtnt

        ExtntWrap readExtnt(long pos)
             throws CorfuException
        a variant of readExtnt that takes the log-offset to read an extent from. The last-read position is remembered for future readExtnt() calls
        Parameters:
        pos - starting position to read
        Returns:
        an extent wrapper, containing ExtntInfo and a list of ByteBuffers, one for each individual log-entry page
        Throws:
        CorfuException

      • appendExtnt

        long appendExtnt(List<ByteBuffer> ctnt)
          throws CorfuException
        Appends an extent to the log. Extent will be written to consecutive log offsets.
        Parameters:
        ctnt - list of ByteBuffers to be written
        Returns:
        the first log-offset of the written range
        Throws:
        CorfuException -
        • OutOfSpaceCorfuException indicates an attempt to append failed because storage unit(s) are full; user may try trim()
        • OverwriteException indicates that an attempt to append failed because of an internal race; user may retry
        • BadParamCorfuException or a general CorfuException indicate an internal problem, such as a server crash. Might not be recoverable

      • appendExtnt

        long appendExtnt(byte[] buf,
                 int reqsize)
          throws CorfuException
        Breaks the bytebuffer is gets as parameter into grain-size buffers, and invokes appendExtnt(List);
        Parameters:
        buf - the buffer to append to the log
        reqsize - size of buffer to append
        Returns:
        the first log-offset of the written range
        Throws:
        CorfuException
        See Also:
        appendExtnt(List ctnt).

      • sync

        void sync()
   throws CorfuException
        force a delay until we are notified that previously invoked writes to the log have been safely forced to persistent store.
        Throws:
        CorfuException - if the call to storage-units failed; in this case, there is no gaurantee regarding data persistence.

      • queryhead

        long queryhead()
        throws CorfuException
        Query the log head (the last trimmed position).
        Returns:
        the current head's index
        Throws:
        CorfuException - if the call fails or returns illegal (negative) value

      • querytail

        long querytail()
        throws CorfuException
        Query the log tail.
        Returns:
        the current tail's index
        Throws:
        CorfuException - if the call fails or returns illegal (negative) value

      • queryck

        long queryck()
      throws CorfuException
        Query the last known checkpoint position.
        Returns:
        the last known checkpoint position.
        Throws:
        CorfuException - if the call fails or returns illegal (negative) value

      • ckpoint

        void ckpoint(long off)
      throws CorfuException
        inform about a new checkpoint mark.
        Parameters:
        off - the offset of the new checkpoint
        Throws:
        CorfuException - if the call fails

      • setMark

        void setMark(long pos)
        set the read mark to the requested position. after this, invoking readExtnt will perform at the specified position.
        Parameters:
        pos - move the read mark to this log position
        Throws:
        CorfuException
